creator: David Rehman
descriptionHtml:
This app help you to connect easily all your devices , paid them and save them in history for future easy connectivity .
reduce connectivity time
fast search
advance connectivity
pair all devices
save devices in history
future connectivity
smooth and user friendly UI
save time
strong connectivity
and many more...
descriptionShort: Bluetooth Auto Connect for all your near by devices
title: Bluetooth Auto Connect: Pair

creator: David Rehman
descriptionHtml:
This app helps you to connect easily all your BT devices, paid them, and save them in history for future easy connectivity.

Bluetooth auto connect application for android has increased the stability time for the strong connection between mobile and Bluetooth devices.

Bluetooth pair is a great application for starting scanning and searching your nearby Bluetooth device. This app has resolved the issue of disconnectivity of Bluetooth devices, once you make a pair by using our connect any Bluetooth device, next time it will make an automatic pair.

Connect any Bluetooth device is an android application specially developed for a stable Bluetooth pair connection. This andriod tool reconnects the lost Bluetooth-connected device. Once you turn on your Bluetooth device it detects the available Bluetooth device in a special area range
and it automatically connects your desired pair which is important for you on a priority base.

For Bluetooth pairing first, our app starts scanning for searching the bluetooth device and then connects the device and once it makes a bluetooth pair then the next time our service makes it auto. Bluetooth scanner auto connects every Bt device i-e Bluetooth loudspeaker, Bluetooth headphone earbuds, and many more.

Main feature
reduce connectivity time
fast search
advance connectivity
pair all devices
save devices in history
future connectivity
smooth and user-friendly UI
save time
strong connectivity
and many more...
descriptionShort: Connect any bluetooth device and make a strong bluetooth pair between BT device
